function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of social support to control the epidemic","Impact":"Increased vulnerability of affected groups to the undesirable effects of the disease","Mitigation":"Implement social support programs and interventions to provide support to affected groups","Technologies":"E-health infrastructure, virtual platforms, telemedicine","People":"Affected populations, individuals with limited access to healthcare","Owner":"Governments, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Limited capacity of health care systems in low and middle-income countries","Impact":"Inability to provide adequate healthcare and support to affected populations","Mitigation":"Invest in and prioritize social interventions and healthcare infrastructure","Technologies":"E-health infrastructure, virtual platforms, telemedicine","People":"Affected populations in low and middle-income countries","Owner":"Governments, international health organizations"},{"Description":"Inaccessibility of psychological interventions in some regions","Impact":"Inability to provide psychological support to affected populations","Mitigation":"Implement remote delivery of psychological interventions through electronic media and virtual platforms","Technologies":"E-health infrastructure, virtual platforms, telemedicine, AI technologies","People":"Affected populations in regions with limited access to psychological interventions","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health professionals"}]}
